mapper.sql: SELECT id, menu_id, parent_id, menu_name, order_num, route_path, component_path, menu_type, `visible`, perms, icon, create_time, update_time FROM `smart-parking-lot`.menu
mapper.select: WHERE menu_type IN ('M', 'C') ORDER BY parent_id, order_num

SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM `smart-parking-lot`.menu m LEFT JOIN `smart-parking-lot`.role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN `smart-parking-lot`.user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN `smart-parking-lot`.`user` u ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE m.perms IS NOT NULL AND u.id = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.order_num, m.route_path, m.component_path, m.menu_type, m.`visible`, m.perms, m.icon, m.create_time, m.update_time FROM `smart-parking-lot`.menu m LEFT JOIN `smart-parking-lot`.role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN `smart-parking-lot`.user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN `smart-parking-lot`.`user` u ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND menu_type IN ('M', 'C') ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.order_num
